Note that
"0004FFFF001D01044C4D5468652054696D65732030332F4A616E2F3230313820426974636F696E206973206E616D65206F66207468652067616D6520666F72206E65772067656E65726174696F6E206F66206669726D73".decode('hex') =>

'\x00\x04\xff\xff\x00\x1d\x01\x04LMThe Times 03/Jan/2018 Bitcoin is name of the game for new generation of firms'


=========================================================

Note that newer block coinbase transactions have their version as "02000000" indicating version 2. This was implemented in BIP34. Also, instead of the Version+NumberOfInputs+PreviousTXHash, there is an extra field of 3 bytes after the version because BIP34 added the requirement that the coinbase scriptSig must start with a push of the block height. This change was made to prevent coinbase transactions from having the same TXID.
